title: Gold and Silver Stamping
context: [CHAPTER 482D] GOLD AND SILVER STAMPING Section 482D-1 Definitions 482D-2 Importation or manufacture of falsely marked gold or silver articles prohibited 482D-3 Standard of fineness of gold articles; deviation 482D-4 Standard of fineness of silver articles; deviation 482D-5 Identifying plated articles; words &ldquo;gold&rdquo;, &ldquo;karat gold&rdquo;, &ldquo;solid gold&rdquo;, &ldquo;ster&rdquo;, &ldquo;sterling&rdquo;, &ldquo;sterling silver&rdquo;, or &ldquo;coin silver&rdquo; forbidden 482D-6 Quality marks; identifying trademarks 482D-7 Violation of fineness standards and stamping requirements 482D-8 Violation of trademarking requirement 482D-9 Contraband; forfeiture 482D-10 Injunctive relief and suits 482D-11 Jurisdiction of civil actions
